metadata.title: CVE-2012-3454 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
eXtplorer 2.1.0b6 uses world writable permissions for the/var/lib/extplorer/ftp_tmp directory, which allows local users to delete oroverwrite arbitrary files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3454` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

extplorer - 2.1.0b6+dfsg.3-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: extplorer package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.0b6+dfsg.3-4').
